titleStmt.title: The case of Sir John Lambert, Bar. Samuel Shepheard, and John James David, merchants of London. Humbly offered to the consideration of this honourable house, for relief.
titleStmt.author: Lambert, John, Sir, d. 1722 or 3.
Shepheard, Samuel.
David, John James.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
